text: Swantham Malavika is a 2003 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Jagadeesh Chandran, starring Vijayaraghavan and Manya in the lead role. http://spicyonion.com/title/swantham-malavika-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Kaviyoor Ponnamma * Rajan P Dev * Kalaranjini * Babu Namboothiri * Gopi Menon * Machan Varghese * Manya * Salim Kumar * Spadikam George * Sruthi * Vijayaraghavan * Rajesh ==References== ==External links== * Category:2003 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Swantham Malavika
